```{r}
df <- read.csv("../Day 8/input.csv")
df
```

```{r}
df$ipa <- NA
df$ipa[1] <- 0
acc <- 0
r <- 1
flag <- TRUE

while(flag == TRUE) {
  if(as.character(df$ope[r]) == "acc" & r <= 626) {
    acc <- acc + df$arg[r]
    flag <- is.na(df$ipa[r + 1])
    df$ipa[r + 1] <- r
    r <- r + 1
    }
  else if(as.character(df$ope[r]) == "jmp" & r + df$arg[r] <= 626) {
    flag <- is.na(df$ipa[r + df$arg[r]])
    df$ipa[r + df$arg[r]] <- r
    r <- r + df$arg[r]
    }
  else if(as.character(df$ope[r]) == "nop" &r <= 626) {
    flag <- is.na(df$ipa[r + 1])
    df$ipa[r + 1] <- r
    r <- r + 1
    }
}

acc
```
